alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 2:31PM CDT until October 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Buffalo and Phelps Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several bands of light to moderate snow will move through the advisory area at various times from late this afternoon into the overnight. This will not be a continuous precipitation event, but rather off and on in nature. While air temperatures will be plenty cold for snow, ground temperatures still remain relatively warm and it may take a while for snowfall to accumulate. However, this may also contribute to slippery road conditions if snow melts and then refreezes on area surfaces, especially after sunset this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
